**As a** Software engineer  
 **I need**user login
 **So that** user can login to the app 
   
 ### Details and Assumptions
 *i need the user email and password 
   
 ### Acceptance Criteria  
   
 ```gherkin
 Given [some context]
 When [certain action is taken]
 Then [the outcome of action is observed]
 ```
